name: Caesar Salad Dressing Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: garlic, dijon mustard, lemon juice, mayonnaise, grated parmesan cheese, salt, freshly ground black pepper, canola oil
recipeIngredient: ¼ cup fresh squeezed lemon juice
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
recipeInstructionSteps: Add the ingredients into a mason jar. Screw the lid on tightly and shake vigorously.
The dressing can remain in the fridge for 1-2 weeks.
Pour over your favorite salad ingredients and enjoy!
